[ti:Fountains]
[ar:Drake/Tems]
[al:Certified Lover Boy]

[00:00.00]Fountains (Explicit) - Drake/Tems
[00:02.78]Lyrics by：A. Graham/T. Openiyi/T. Riziki
[00:05.57]Composed by：A. Graham/T. Openiyi/T. Riziki
[00:08.36]Drake：
[00:10.74]How do you know the way I feel
[00:12.36]
[00:13.81]You got me losing my mind oh
[00:16.90]
[00:20.19]Try to suppress my emotions
[00:22.05]
[00:23.38]They're bursting like fountains baby
[00:26.49]
[00:29.84]They take me up they take me down
[00:31.60]
[00:32.96]I'm getting weak in my knees oh
[00:36.17]
[00:38.68]Tems：
[00:38.88]I got nothing to admire taste certain
[00:42.12]
[00:43.61]Baby longing you make me feel something
[00:47.43]
[00:48.22]I got my eyes on you pull down the curtain
[00:52.26]
[00:53.08]I'll be patient with you no more fighting
[00:57.01]Drake/Tems：
[00:57.34]Oh baby
[00:58.28]Come in come in yeah come in
[01:01.09]
[01:01.75]I cannot fathom this life without you
[01:05.96]
[01:07.26]Woah oh come in come in yeah come in
[01:10.69]
[01:11.35]This feels like home now
[01:13.22]
[01:13.80]Come in and stay here
[01:15.55]

[01:16.95]

[01:20.73]

[01:25.57]

[01:30.25]
[01:37.17]I feel you in my mind

[01:45.73]

[01:48.12]

[01:50.85]
[01:51.49]You'vе broken down the door
[01:53.13]
[01:54.44]Don't make me go no
[01:55.68]
[01:56.64]I just wanna hold you
[01:58.41]
[01:59.03]I need no control no
[02:01.49]Would you let me love you me love you
[02:04.80]It's all over
[02:05.49]
[02:06.18]I lost my composure
[02:08.01]
[02:08.64]I got love to show you
[02:10.38]
